column4: i typed "sudo apt-get upgrade" but still me java version is 1.4.2 (i need 1.5.x) ?
you could do it manually from java website
have you modified your /etc/apt/sources.list file? There are repositories
no i didnt edited that file
if you search for java with aptitude search command, what do you get?
you might have to open new repos to get the 1.6 jdk
i think it will be hard for me to do that i am new at ubuntu
no it's not, I'll help you.
ok what are the steps i should do ?
actually I think there are no jdk 1.6 in repos anyway. I have installed it manually from the website
btw thanks alot for your help  :)
